channel.title: Comments on: About
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: By: Rashid Azar

item.description: @all, update your plugin. The problem has been fixed in latest release.
item.content:encoded: @all, update your plugin. The problem has been fixed in latest release.

item.content:encoded: I have the same problem. Please, help

item.title: By: Maharani
item.dc:creator: Maharani
item.description: Rashid, why is it that after I installed ra-socialize, everytime I copy paste link of my posting, network.stamperz.com always appears? Very annoying. I already deleted the plugin, but still the copy paste result the same. I cleared cache, didn't work. My hosting company said, that network.stamperz.com appearance came from your plugin. When I deleted it, the people from my hosting company could see normal appearance of the copy pasted link, but I still have that network.stamperz.com appearance until now! I can't get rid of it from my computer. I ain't no computer literate so this might be a piece of cake for you but for me it's a big deal. Please help... thank you
item.content:encoded: Rashid, why is it that after I installed ra-socialize, everytime I copy paste link of my posting, network.stamperz.com always appears? Very annoying. I already deleted the plugin, but still the copy paste result the same. I cleared cache, didn’t work. My hosting company said, that network.stamperz.com appearance came from your plugin. When I deleted it, the people from my hosting company could see normal appearance of the copy pasted link, but I still have that network.stamperz.com appearance until now! I can’t get rid of it from my computer. I ain’t no computer literate so this might be a piece of cake for you but for me it’s a big deal. Please help… thank you
